TextEng: Tymofarrar is dead.
You want proof?!
No, I don't have any proof.
I got the mask artifact from him, didn't I?
Text: 그에게서 가면 유물을 얻었잖아, 안 그래?

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade/Lie]</Start> Trust me, Deekin... he's dead.
That's it! You're going to die for this insult!!
Text: 좋아! 이 모욕의 대가로 죽는 거야!!

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Trust me, Deekin... he's dead.
I have his head. How's that for proof?
Text: 그의 머리를 가지고 있어. 이 정도면 증거가 되겠어?

TextEng: Well, I talked to Tymofarrar...
Never mind.
It doesn't matter. He's dead, now.
I haven't persuaded him to free you, yet.
He wants me to kill J'Nah... and then he'll let you go.
Text: 그가 즈나를 죽이길 원해... 그러면 널 풀어준대.

TextEng: He said you're free to go. He gave me this... doll... to give to you.
Text: 네가 자유라고 했어. 이... 인형을... 너한테 주라고 줬어.

TextEng: He said he really didn't care what you did.
<StartCheck>[Persuade/Lie]</Start> He said you're free to go.
I got news for you, alright: you're dead!
Get away from me, you filthy cretin!
If I have something to tell you, I'll tell you.
Sorry, Deekin, nothing yet.
I don't need your help.
I have some questions.
No more questions, here.
How do I know you even have the tower statue?
Text: 네가 탑 조각상을 가지고 있다는 걸 어떻게 믿어?

TextEng: Fair enough, I suppose.
What use is a broken statue to me?
There is no shiny rock inside. You're lying!
Text: 안에 반짝이는 돌은 없어. 거짓말하는 거야!

TextEng: I didn't know it was there, either, until you told me.
I want to know more about these gnolls.
Text: 이 놀들에 대해 더 알고 싶어.

TextEng: What happened during the attack?
And the gnolls didn't chase you?
Why did they attack you, then?
Tell me about the other kobolds.
Enough about the kobolds.
Is there a secret way in to find Tymofarrar?
Well... won't Tymofarrar be angry if I kill all his kobolds?
Text: 음... 내가 그의 코볼트들을 전부 죽이면 티모파라르가 화내지 않을까?

TextEng: What protections do these caves have?
Text: 이 동굴들엔 어떤 방어 장치가 있어?

TextEng: Ice Hounds?
Master Jumper?
Big Chief?
Tell me about Tymofarrar.
Alright, enough about the dragon.
How long has Tymofarrar lived in the area? Do you know?
Text: 티모파라르가 이 지역에 얼마나 오래 살았어? 알아?

TextEng: Just how powerful is Tymofarrar, anyway?
Does this dragon have any weaknesses that you know of?
Text: 이 용에게 네가 아는 약점이 있어?

TextEng: Do you know how Tymofarrar knew that Drogan had those artifacts?
Text: 티모파라르가 드로건이 그 유물들을 가지고 있다는 걸 어떻게 알았는지 알아?

TextEng: He has a lot of treasure, does he?
Do you know where he hides it?
Why would Tymofarrar want to steal the artifacts?
Where do I find him?
Why don't you want to go back to your old Master?
Text: 왜 옛 주인님한테 돌아가고 싶지 않은 거야?

TextEng: You really think that's possible?
Don't be ridiculous. You're just a kobold!
Oh, I'm not such a great traveler.
Text: 아, 나도 그렇게 대단한 여행자는 아니야.

TextEng: I think that's an admirable goal.
Do you know anything about a sorceress named J'Nah?
Text: 즈나라는 요술사에 대해 아는 게 있어?

TextEng: He sent the kobolds on the raid because he was angry?
What I want is that tower statue.
Text: 내가 원하는 건 그 탑 조각상이야.

TextEng: Alright, have it your way.
<StartAction>[Cast Charm Person]</Start> But I'm your friend, Deekin.
Text: <StartAction>[사람 매혹 시전]</Start> 하지만 난 네 친구야, 디킨.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> How about you just show it to me, so I know you do have it?
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 그냥 내게 보여주는 게 어때? 네가 정말 가지고 있는지 알 수 있게.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Don't you trust me? I promise I'll free you.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 날 못 믿는 거야? 널 자유롭게 해주겠다고 약속할게.

TextEng: <StartCheck>[Intimidate]</Start> Listen... give me the statue *now* and this will hurt a lot less.
Text: <StartCheck>[위협]</Start> 들어봐... 조각상을 *지금* 내놔. 그러면 덜 아플 거야.

TextEng: That's it! I'd rather kill you than get the statue!
Text: 좋아! 조각상 얻는 것보다 널 죽이는 게 낫겠어!

TextEng: For starters, stop calling me "<CUSTOM1001>".
I don't really care.
Call me "Mistress"!
Call me "Master"!
I'd prefer you didn't talk to me at all.
Text: 차라리 나한테 말을 안 걸었으면 좋겠어.

TextEng: "The great <FirstName>" will do, I suppose.
My name is <FirstName>.
I should go.
I could use some help. Why don't you travel with me?
Text: 도움이 좀 필요해. 나와 함께 여행하는 게 어때?

TextEng: Oh, forget it.
Tymofarrar is not going to swoop down on you, I'm sure.
Text: 티모파라르가 네게 덮치진 않을 거야, 확신해.

TextEng: It would be funny to watch, that's for sure.
No, I suppose not.
Why are you following me? Speak quickly!
Text: 왜 나를 따라오는 거야? 빨리 말해!

TextEng: I would never help an evil creature such as you!
Text: 너 같은 사악한 생명체는 절대 돕지 않을 거야!

TextEng: You should be more frightened of me! Die, monster!!
Text: 나를 더 두려워해야 할 텐데! 죽어라, 괴물!!

TextEng: And why would I even consider helping you?
Text: 왜 내가 널 돕는 걸 고려하기라도 하겠어?

TextEng: So what did you do that is so terrible?
Text: 그래서 네가 그렇게 끔찍한 짓을 뭘 한 거야?

TextEng: Alright. I'll see what I can do.
Text: 좋아. 내가 뭘 할 수 있을지 보지.

TextEng: You mean Blumberg?
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Give me the statue and I might consider helping you.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 조각상을 내게 줘. 그러면 널 도울지 고려해볼게.

TextEng: Hand the statue over right now, kobold. Your life depends on it!
Text: 조각상을 당장 내놔, 코볼트. 네 목숨이 달렸어!

TextEng: So how am I supposed to help you?
Text: 그래서 내가 어떻게 널 도와야 하는데?

TextEng: Are you blackmailing me?!
And why should your Master listen to me?
Text: 왜 네 주인님이 내 말을 들어야 하는데?

TextEng: What if I just killed him, instead?
Why do you need him to free you? Aren't you already free?
Text: 왜 그가 널 자유롭게 해야 하는데? 이미 자유로운 거 아니야?

TextEng: What do you mean the tower statue is 'broken'?
What shiny thing inside? What are you talking about?
Text: 안에 반짝이는 게 뭔데? 무슨 말을 하는 거야?

TextEng: You have the tower statue on you?
How do I know you'll keep your word?
Are you saying that you're some kind of... kobold jester?
Text: 네가... 코볼트 광대 같은 거라는 뜻이야?

TextEng: If you're so important, why do you need my help?
Text: 그렇게 중요한 존재라면, 왜 내 도움이 필요한 거야?

TextEng: You're a bard? Can you even cast spells?
Uh-huh.
Who is this Master you speak of?
I want to ask you about something else.
Forget it. Now you die, little beast!
Text: 잊어버려. 이제 넌 죽는 거야, 작은 짐승아!

TextEng: I'm not helping you with anything.
Text: 난 네 일을 절대 돕지 않아.

TextEng: Tell me more about this dragon.
Text: 이 용에 대해 더 말해 줘.

TextEng: Where can I find this Master of yours?
Text: 네 주인님을 어디서 찾을 수 있어?

TextEng: Maybe you should come and show me.
Text: 아마 네가 와서 보여줘야 할 것 같아.

TextEng: So this Tymofarrar was behind the theft of the artifacts?
Text: 그러니까 이 티모파라르가 유물 도난의 배후였어?

TextEng: So what am I supposed to do against a dragon?
Text: 그래서 용을 상대로 어떻게 해야 하는데?

TextEng: Why did these gnolls want the artifacts?
A dragon?! What am I supposed to do against a dragon?!
Text: 용이라고?! 용을 상대로 어떻게 해야 한다는 거야?!

TextEng: Help you? After what you did to Hilltop and Master Drogan?!
Text: 널 돕는다고? 힐탑과 드로건 사부님한테 한 짓을 하고?!

TextEng: You need my help?
Back off! I'll have no tricks out of you!
Deekin? The kobolds in the crypt mentioned you.
A kobold? What do you want?
What happened here? Why are you in this ruined store?
Text: 여기서 무슨 일이 있었어? 왜 이 폐허가 된 가게에 있어?

TextEng: Deekin? What are you doing here?
What happened to you? Where did you go?
Now that I have the statue, you die!!
Text: 이제 조각상을 가졌으니, 넌 죽는 거야!!

TextEng: Just go. I don't want to see you ever again, creature!
Text: 그냥 가. 다신 보고 싶지 않아, 이 생명체야!

TextEng: I don't really care what you do.
You're welcome to come with me, if you like.
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> Tymofarrar is dead.
<StartAction>[Lie]</Start> Well, I talked to Tymofarrar...
<StartAction>[Cast Charm Person]</Start> I think you want to give me that statue now.
Text: <StartAction>[사람 매혹 시전]</Start> 이제 그 조각상을 내게 주고 싶을 거야.
